turkish_example_sentence: O karanlık koridorun sonuna korkuyla bakmamış olsaydı, tehlikeli durumu fark ederdi
english_example_sentence: If she hadn't looked at the end of the dark corridor with fear, she would have noticed the dangerous situation
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не смотрела на конец темного коридора со страхом, она бы заметила опасную ситуацию
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O karanlık koridorun sonuna korkuyla ______, tehlikeli durumu fark ederdi
